question: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning has been introduced recently in which portal of MSME Ministry?
explanation:
The Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises has introduced Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning for strengthening its CHAMPIONS portal. The Champions Portal was launched by the Prime Minister in June 2020 to assist the MSMEs across the country.
This multimodal system also has technology equipped physical control rooms at around 69 locations in the country. This is seen as a move in the direction of Industry 4.0.
